body_html:
@Carmezim looks like the new version of bazel is causing this problem. Many are facing this issue both on Mac and Ubuntu. #15492 And it also looks like the next release of Tensorflow has this fixed.

Building it with --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false in the bazel build command solved the issue. My build command now is:
bazel build --config=opt --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
